WORK EXPERIENCE 
Principal Engineer 
Optum Global Solutions Private Limited 
04/2018 - Present
, 
 
Currently architecting, engineering, and leading the team on building an app for clinicians' safety, focusing on incident recording and
precautionary measures for house call visits. 
Leveraged GPT-3.5 and built a react library for seamless self-service registration forms and onboard customers to many internal
apps. Integrated with ServiceNow for incident management and provided an intuitive UI using NextJS and Vercel AI SDK. 
Developed a real-time chat app with GunJS, incorporating on-device GenAI Gemini for language translation, during a Hackathon. 
Working with the business to write new capabilities, architect solutions, and provide KT sessions and demos to explain proposed
solutions. 
Guiding and mentoring engineering teams on best practices. 
Built microservices using Quarkus, Mandrel, GraalVM, SpringBoot, and Docker for serverless functions, with HA enabled
Active/Active state across clusters. 
Implemented Git Actions & Jenkins pipelines for CI/CD and integrated change control processes for production deployments. 
Established observability and telemetry for services. 
Being part of lean engineering team, built Optum Functions Platform (OFP), Optum's ﬁrst Serverless Platform (FPaaS) on Optum's
private network. Created many customized features using Golang for self service and governance of the cluster.

Assisted in recruiting and competency-building activities.
